issue.title: [Python] Better pytest parametrization for different compression codecs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13380](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13380). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up for https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10717

Certain codecs are optional, we should have global pytest fixtures automatically applying the right pytest markers.
